Class SaveLoad

  • java.lang.Object

extends Object

      • loadGame

        public void loadGame​(String p_fileName)
        The function `loadGame` loads game data from a file and initializes the game map, players, continents, countries, orders, cards, and strategies.
        Parameters:
        p_fileName - The parameter `p_fileName` is a String that represents the name of the file from which the game data will be loaded.
